Kitchen and Laundry

Cooking and cleaning creates a lot of mess, and a lot of it becomes trash. There's plenty of home-made alternatives to cleaning products you're already using, but if you neither have the time nor interest in making your own, then we've found products offering a good clean without the compromise.

  • Bees Wrap

    Waxed-cloth food wrapping

  • BlueLand

    Cleaning and soap tablets

  • Dropps

    Laundry and dishwasher detergent pods

We're a work in progress

This site doesn't take any fees or payment for recommendations, it's simply a list of products and services we know work well for normal people who just want to make Less Mess in the world.
